headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: conversation_type
parameters.description: Conversation type. Currently, the only allowed values are: STRANGER : Conversations with users who have sent a message to the Business Account of the business, but the business has not yet accepted the message request and responded to the message. SINGLE : One-on-one conversations with users who have sent a message to the Business Account of the business, and the business has previously responded to the user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of conversations to return for this request. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination. If the response parameter has_more is true , pass the returned cursor value in this parameter in the subsequent request to receive the next page of conversations. Default value: 0.
